## Objectives

For this exercise, create and format a summary table of the `penguins` dataset, showing one of the following (or some other permutation):

* one or more of the "demographic" groupings (e.g., island, species, year)

* one or more of the "measurement" variables

This will require you to 

1. wrangle the data into the structure you want

1. format the wrangled table

```{r}
df_penguins <- penguins
```
